author: you
name: RunapurOnline
short: GTA Online-style Runapur economy game with heat, heists, bounties, jail, and businesses.
description: A Runapur (Black Lagoon) themed GTA Online-like loop using Red's Bank + Config. Includes hustle jobs, bounties, heists, wanted/heat, jail, items, businesses, and leaderboards.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores per-user game stats (heat, jail timer, businesses, inventory, cooldown timestamps) using Red's Config.
